968390.name: Deceit - Vampire Pack
968390.description:
With the Vampire Expansion, you will be able to prey on innocent victims as you transform into the exclusive Vampire Terror form! This terror form offers a brand new terror tactic through its active: the Swarm.

When activated, the swarm marks your spot, and gives you a boost of speed to hunt down your victim. Re-activating the ability will quickly teleport you back to where you initially activated the ability, allowing you to cover vast amounts of territory, or help trap innocents who stumble into your path.

As well as this, when you unlock both the Werewolf and Vampire DLCs you will also gain access to an exclusive legendary melee weapon called the Wakizashi!

On top of that, the Vampire pack includes an exclusive Vampire Emblem, 3 loot booth tokens to help you get even more cosmetic gear for your character and 200 GM Credits to put towards your next item or use with the Reputation system to show appreciation to your favourite fellow players.

This pack contains:
  • Exclusive: Playable Vampire Terror
  • Exclusive: ‘You Suck’ T-shirt
  • Exclusive: Stake Melee Weapon
  • Exclusive: Vampire Emblem
  • 3 Loot Booth Tokens
  • 200 GM Credits
968390.supported_languages:
英语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 德语, 俄语, 简体中文, 日语, 韩语, 法语, 意大利语, 匈牙利语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 荷兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 土耳其语, 罗马尼亚语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
